tool_description: This application is perfect for generating funny and ironic textual content in French to use in your powerpoints, meetings, corporate brochures, and more! Simply call the get request with no parameter, and the app will generate a random selection of text for you.
name: Pipotronic
title: Pipotronic

api_list.name: Get sentence
api_list.description: Funny and ironic randomly generated textual content to incorportate into powerpoints, meetings, corporate brochures...
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pipotronic.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pipotronic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pipotronic.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pipotronic.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
